version_name: 4.0 is a major upgrade of MagicPlan. It includes a lot of new important features that many of our customers have requested:- Ceiling Corner Capture- Wall Height Capture- Map Transfer Between Devices- Map Backup on Cloud- Map Sharing- Higher Precision via

* Improved wall editor lets you place objects by entering a distance from a wall
* Improved Import & Draw workflow lets you select the scale before drawing

• Brand new wall editor allows to see things vertically and place objects on walls precisely.
• Create vivid impressions of homes by connecting a 360° camera.
• Redesigned image picker allows to take photos in one click or access photo library.

In this release, we’re proud to announce a beta version of an OBJ file export. This lets you export your 3D models to import & edit them in 3D design software. Yay! Please bear in mind, this is a beta release. Give it a shot and let us know what you t

Zo vers en zo schoon: We hebben USDZ-bestanden toegevoegd aan onze 3D Export functie. Hiermee kunt u uw 3D-modellen in een mooie AR. Probeer het eens en laat ons weten wat u denkt!
Zo vers en zo schoon: We hebben USDZ-bestanden toegevoegd aan onze 3D Export functie. Hiermee kunt u uw 3D-modellen in een mooie AR. Probeer het eens en laat ons weten wat u denkt!
Zo vers en zo schoon: We hebben USDZ-bestanden toegevoegd aan onze 3D Export functie. Hiermee kunt u uw 3D-modellen in een mooie AR. Probeer het eens en laat ons weten wat u denkt!
So fresh and so clean: We added USDZ files to our 3D Export feature. This will let you showcase your 3D models in fancy AR. Give it a try and let us know what you think!

[IMPORTANT] This release removes the legacy room scan mode “Sensor Capture”. If you own an iPad Air 2 or iPad mini 4 you will lose the ability to scan rooms. If you own any other iOS device, you will not be affected by these changes.

Other changes

- Change your email directly in the app
